author: max
install_msg:
Thanks for installing. Once you load this it will replace your restart and shutdown command with this cog, on unload you will have the Core one back.

You can change the messages in settings for this cog in `[p]advset`.
description: This cog ask for confirmation if you want to shutdown or restart your bot.
short: Asks for confirmation to attept to shutdown or restart your bot.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any End User Data.
